descriptionHtml:
Do you hate it when you follower dies or when your follower is low on health, magicka, or stanima. This mod will fix that. With this spell that you will get at the beginning of the game will restore and fortify their health, magicka, and stanima. The effect will only last a day. And it requires no magicka or skills to cast. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1006/?]here[/url]. And if you play Oblivion also look at my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/28896?]Oblivion Followers Spell[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
